We shouldn't increase the population of predators in the area.
There is only one alpha for this pack.

This man embodies the duality of nature, serving as both wise shaman and deadly predator. Swift and cunning, the Beastmaster can hunt down his prey in wild close combat, inflicting bleeding wounds in his righteous rage. When the time is right, he can {colour_start|notable}Prowl{colour_end} away from the heat of frontline combat and prepare: either for a deadly ambush or to call upon the spirits in aid of his pack. In nature, nothing is wasted: fallen corpses can be consumed to gain great power, or be seeded to create a temporary ally.

The Beastmaster eschews heavy armor, needing little more than life-affirming flesh and twin blades to defy corruption. Druidic knowledge and shamanic abilities provide finer protection than any steel. The ritual tattoos painted across his body are carved in exaltation of nature's spirits, marking him as the embodiment of vengeance for all wildlife tainted by malicious evil.

As a master of wildlife, the Beastmaster uses his surroundings to ensure the group's survival. He adapts to the fallow regions surrounding the hamlet by utilizing endemic herbs and consulting local spirits. During long nights, he wanders off to commune with animals and track down potential threats, making him a perfect scout to ensure safe exploration through these corrupted lands.
FIRST AID
ENCOURAGE
BIG GAME HUNT
PREYSTALKER
WILDLIFE EXPERTISE
TOTEMIC GUIDANCE
SHAMANISM
The root of this plant will relieve pain.
Your strength and vitality will remain here, with us...
I will take care of your wounds.
Let the great predator awake in you!
A moment of silence to honor the lives we will take this night.
Let the heat of blood temper our spirits.
I can smell their fear...
Only silence will witness the death of my enemies.
They will not hear me approach...
I know their scent. I can hear them whisper to each other without voice.
The land will give us everything we need.
Take this. You need to nourish yourself.
These herbs and roots will alleviate our ailments.
We have the favor of the spirits that prowl this place.
I summon the animals that fell due to the corruption of this place.
Brave brothers, come to me and grant us your strength from the other side.
Every rock, tree, and creature has a life, a spirit, a name...
Your heart is full of nobility and courage. Hold on to it!
Don't let fear and despair hunt you down, my friend...
You are wise and strong like a millenary oak. You won't fall so easily.
The spirits whisper remedies to my ears, for all kinds of ailments.
Mistletoe to numb, mandrake to strengthen, and a piece of Tannis root...
I have the knowledge to alleviate any disease, trust me.
Produce a Totem
Search for Herbs

Necessary Justice

The men of this place have forgotten their origins. The rivers burn and the forests dry up with the same avarice that awakens the death. However, not everyone will look away when corruption chokes nature's bosom.
Assimilate the fallen

A silent man meditates alone, and in silence the spirits of animals rally around him. They penetrate his skin and make his body a new home. They find redemption in a shared soul. They make his voice a united howl.
Miraculous Root
Rare medicinal ingredient. Cures {colour_start|disease}Diseases{colour_end} & {colour_start|notable}Status Effects{colour_end}

From death springs life!
Spirits of the Ancients protect me!
A deserved rest after fighting against the corruption of this site.
I will meditate in silence while you rest your agitated bodies.
I need to rest to regain strength and cleanse my spirit.
There you have it, the unclean heart. Origin of all evil and corruption.
I don't intend to put myself in the hands of those quacks.
The poisons of these people don't overshadow the natural medicine.
I don't plan to go there...
They treat me like a savage when savagery comes from their practices.
I abandoned civilization long ago.
Are you aware of the animals they torture to reach their ointments?
I don't want to be part of this voracious and corrupt human society.
Maybe I fall here. But my message has taken root. Many others will come after me.
I will fight against all this malice until my last breath!!
I return to the bosom of Mother Nature. It is the endless cycle of all things.
Death is only part of a cycle
I will return to the earth I came from
Wicked being! Part of, but departed from nature.
This thing exists beyond all cycles!
These predators are no children of the wilds!
The hunter becomes the hunted...
We are just prey, sent out to be hunted...
The corruption has taken hold of this place.
I lost the tracks.... Hope of return is futile.
Can you see the beasts' eyes glaring at us from the dark?
We are stalked! Watch your backs!
These predators are beyond my experience!
I can see the beast within you. Do not try to hide it!
I can feel the pain of a thousand souls!
The agony of all these souls is too much to bear!
A broken bone for each broken twig!
Peel off my skin!!!
My skin burns in the pain of thousand deaths!
Your hamlet is a memorial to folly.
You detached yourself from nature, but she will claim you back.
The endless cycle of pain will never end. It will start anew now.
No deed can redeem what we did to nature. We should all perish
I am the Apex predator. Follow your new Alpha or perish!
Survival is easier on my own.
Your civilizatioon made you weak. Survive alone.
Nature rejects unpure souls like you.
The wild will claim the weak.
Prove yourself to nature. Kill or be killed.
This place is a wound wich can never be healed!
Corruption soaked every root and any plant. This place is lost!
The wild is silent. No bird shares its song anymore.
I can feel the pain of this wicked being. We need to end it.
*Gnarls*
Your prowess is better left to me. Let me usurp you, I will take care of your suffering.
The soil screams in agony, we can never calm these tainted grounds!
The birds do not peck in this place, and their nests are full of bones...
I can hear the spirits lament inside me.
I am sacred. You are sacred. The land is sacred.
Spirits, Brothers ... have you abandoned me?
The roots of this site reek of death. The smell is unbearable!
Why should I team up with other humans? Are not we the cause of so much pain?
It disgusts me to belong to the most corrupt species that has trod this land!
This body is truly a cage for everything it contains.
Everything is sick. Everything is rotten, lonely, isolated and forgotten.
I should leave my body as feed for the beasts.
I should die so my remains feed the plants and the land.
I wish to be devoured, so my essence will become part of another, nobler creature.
I deserve to be forgotten forever. I will disappear in the memory of a vast universe.
I should nail my jaws in your throat and end your miserable and corrupt existence.
Humans. So selfish, so full of arrogance. Miserably believing everything is theirs...
What is the point of fighting for good if you kill animals and corrupt the river?
You deserve to be at the bottom of the food pyramid...
Even worms and parasites are embarrassed to see you fight.
I'm not at the same level as you. Your souls are still corrupt because of your nature...
In my eyes, you are nothing but scared prey.
You don't know the nature of human corruption nor the darkness in your soul.
You will end up being food for a creature better than you.
I am the Alpha of this herd!
The earth dies, the animals are extinguished... and all because of humans.
None of this would have happened if the Ancestor hadn't been so arrogant.
I feel so very lonely, fighting for something so fair...
Over half of the world's wildlife has been lost, and what we have left continues to decline...
In barely forty years, we have extinguished almost half of the species in our planet. Regrettable...
Scraw! Scraw!
ROAR!!!
Quack! Quack!
Woof! Woof!
My determination will not be broken by the miserable ones. My conviction is iron and my ferocity is ardent.
I am the hunter who comes for you. Tremble before my roar.
I will feed on the horror that you have sown.
I will bring justice for those whose voice you have extinguished.
The fury of nature is on my side! Tremble at her mortal embrace!
The spirits have spoken, and they have shown how to crush any stone in our path.
I will make my enemies food for the grass and home for insects.
I will tear your throat with the force of my bare teeth!
I will feast on your entrails. I am twinned with hyenas and vultures.
Every pore of my skin is full of light and hope!
My tattoos shine with the strength of a thousand species!
Follow in my footsteps, I will lead you to redemption and glory!
The regenerative power of lizard, worm and mollusk!
My soul pulses with thousands of lives!
I have strength and courage for anyone who needs it.
ROOOOAAAAAAR!!!!
Spirits watch over you too, friend.
I invoke the fallen ones to protect you and share their strength!
The spirit of the wolf is inside all of you. Can you feel it?!
Don't doubt, we are the hunters... they are prey.
I am a leader, a fighter, and the hope of this land. I will not give up!
It's time to lick my wounds.
Not even the earth will want to conquer our remains!
We are doomed to die. It is an unstoppable cycle.
The spirits shrink inside me, their lamentations and roars sound far away...
You can't escape your pathetic human nature.
Am I animals trapped in a body? Or a body trapped in animals?
I have failed you brothers, all of you. Because of me you will be forgotten...
As man does with forests, I deserve to be ripped out and suffocated.
Belonging to the human species is my greatest condemnation. We deserve extinction.
Look at it in a positive way... Nature will get rid of four undesirable humans.
You! Parasite with two legs. Even snakes make you shake.
Don't worry. I will take care to feed the jackals with your corpse.
All of you are a ridiculous pack.
I will devour you one by one if it allows my survival.
You don't even know how to develop in the artificial and poisonous world that you have built.
The spirits will only help me, you don't deserve their aid.
More than 150 species are extinguished every day. Think about it...
The hopes of this team are doomed to extinction...
Are we the hunter or the hunted?
I need to get out of here! I must feed my litter!
And my chicks flew away, leaving the nest empty and filling it with sorrow.
It's convenient to wait. It's not time to pounce the prey.
Crouching in the brush is the best option.
I prefer not to be so exposed...
It's better to stalk my prey instead of attacking it.
It's better to plan from the rear.
I have to act like rats and weasels.
My longing for the pulsing blood is irrepressible.
My body will be the shield for all life.
I expose myself without fear to claw and steel.
ROAAAAR!!!
I must hunt to survive!
SCREEEEEEW!!
SHHHHHHH!!
I will flee from this disaster by flapping my wings.
I'd better go back to the burrow.
Destroy this cell of muscle and skin and release the spirits inside me!
I will accept my end courageously... without looking back.
My end has arrived. The cycle of life can't be escaped.
My powers are useless in the front line. And surely too in the rear...
I need to ponder my position in this whole situation.
I need to recover strength, and also hope...
Stand aside! I am the Alpha of the pack!
Get out of my way, human!
Your unnatural artifices are only a hindrance in my mission.
I don't intend to give my life for a handful of corrupt humans.
It would be better if you hunt for me.
Go ahead, pack! Defend your Alpha!
Death, death everywhere... the perpetual autumn.
*plaintive howl*
The spirits howl terrified inside me.
I can't distract myself, the beast goes after me claming revenge...
The spirits have stopped talking to me! I can't hear their voices!
The roots of time imprison my wrists with reproaches and grief. Mother, I failed you.
I know it's not a good time to meditate, but...
I will do what I find convenient. That's why I'm the leader of this pack.
Leave me be. The Spirits have something to tell me and I need to hear them...
Everything is useless. I can do nothing to stop corruption.
I don't think that anything I can do will be able to improve the situation.
My tattoos don't work. They need encouragement to shine again.
Meowww...
I will act as the great oaks do. Watch time go by.
Not now, I'm hibernating.
The spirits guide my steps...
The spirits have taken control of this body!
Let me do it...
I will fall on them with the force of a condor!
I don't fear pain or death!
I will not be intimidated by pain. Pain reminds us that we are full of life!
Instinct is not tied to any order nor any cheap convention!
I will not obey the orders of a parasitic mammal!
The indomitable soul is not bound in any order.
I know what to do...
Do you really think I intend to obey?
I trust my instinct more than your will...
Whatever I do, the result will be sterile...
Maybe by doing this I will calm the sorrow of the spirits.
My will is tied to a greater good. I'm just a puppet of the rough heart of the land.
I can't repress the will of the land!
Act first. Think later.
There's no easy way out from this...
The vermin lurk in the shadows. This land seeks revenge for my many mistakes.
Predators prefer to hunt their prey at night, catching them off guard.
Enjoy the rest. We may not have many more opportunities to enjoy it.
While you rest, our enemies are strengthened and corruption flourishes.
I begin to suspect that you do not share my goals, nor my path.
This mission is a giant mousetrap. A hole we may never escape.
You do not know what real pain is, but I can show you...
The suffering of this land falls on my back. It is a weight I must bear.
If you knew what I do, you too would stop trusting humans.
Go ahead, sleep. Hopefully you will not wake up...
Try and turn your back on me and you will die!
Your flesh seems tender and tasty. For your sake, make sure we do not run out of food.
Go ahead, dream of a better world. A world in which man and his mark do not exist...
Stop prattling or I'll give your tongue to the birds.
Birds have better conversation than any of you...
Man will be responsible for his own extinction.
The Earth will respond to human egoism with a cataclysm.
Life is suffocating in this place. We move in a dark and dull direction.
The spirits will contemplate our end with silent eyes.
My instinct asks for blood and violence. And I will give in...
I delighted in his flesh to gain his strength and power. Only the pink bones remained...
They cornered me and hunted me down. Skinning me when even my breath had not given way.
Our constantly increasing demands on nature are driving wildlife to extinction...
Face me if you have the courage to do so. Grrr...
Here you have my bare chest. Dare to pierce my flesh!
I accept my end with stoicity. Go ahead, strike down this body and free the lives it contains.
Mother earth, I come to your naked breast, to the origin of everything.
Come on... COME ON!!
It's me you're looking for. I represent everything you crave to destroy!!
You are the main problem on this team. As a stone on the road!
Only the strongest survive here. It is the law of nature!
Selfish and corrupting human! All of you are to blame for so much suffering!
You are much more useful as a home for plants and insects!
YOU ARE MY PREY!!
The spirits have marked you as their enemy!
Pain reminds us that we are full of life!
I spill my blood for the injustices against mother nature!
No one can defeat me, except my condemned heart.
I feel the guilt of my kind on my shoulders!
Spirits bite and scratch my body from the inside, fighting to escape this cage of flesh!
I will taste my own flesh, I will eat myself and I will be born again from my hunger!
I promise to kill you one by one if you act so cowardly!
Accept your end with honor and strength. Show your chest and raise your forehead!
I think none of us will come out of this...
Sorry brothers, our hopes have been consumed...
I'm not going to perish alone...
If the spirits tell us to stay still, we will do it!
Grrrrrr...
If my nest has burned, we too will burn!
They pounce on us like hyenas!
I'll end up with more scars than ink on my skin!
My mission can't end here! Not like this!
Pain grows from the seed of our incompetence!
I have to endure the attacks that only others deserve!
Go ahead, leave me alone! I do not need your help in this combat!
Is that all? Come on... my body can stand much more!
It's just a scratch... disappointing.
You have damaged my plumage!
GRRRAWWRR!!
My... my powers abandon me. The spirits have withdrawn their word!
I am not worth the responsibility I carry.
I don't find reasons to this disaster!
The enemy knows our steps... someone has been stalking us!
My rage blinds my blows!
I should hurt myself. Surely that way I won't miss...
I am like a lion without teeth...
SSShhhh...
Your artifices have distanced you from your true nature.
I would not have missed such a laughable prey ...
As fierce as a sloth...
You have lost your natural instinct...
The battlefield awakens my appetite...
Let me wallow among their corpses!
If we continue like this, we will end up with our bones in their jaws!
We stand no chance against them!
We are too old for this...
Your mistakes are our condemnation!
Some are born to be cattle.
You are the best at wasting opportunities!
Your enemies are faster than you... and wiser.
It would be better if you hide your head under the ground.
I can smell your mediocrity from here.
The best thing would be to return to our burrow!
I fear that our team will be reduced shortly...
Can you smell that bitter essence? It is Death.
Why do I team up with you?!
You could have dodged it. The reasons why you have not done so... are not within my reach.
That is what we need: Violence, blood, pain... that which fuels instinct.
The beasts within me are agitated by your pain!
You will end with your head on the top of their banners.
As agile and veiled as an ancient tortoise...
The spirits seek your pain. Their plans come as whispers to my ears!
Test your own blood and you will taste fear!
We'll see if the rest are so lucky.
Sooner or later you will die. It's the cycle of nature. You've just won a little time.
It's as if you were coordinated...
A suspicious reaction...
An unequal fight, and as such... cowardly.
Now it's my turn to receive a blow, to maintain the balance of the universe.
From this site I can stalk them better... And I'm more secure.
I will remain in this position. If I want to survive I must first trust my judgment.
I don't need a more defensive position!
No, I still don't have enough scars on my body!
I won't obey the barking of a puppy...
I move by instinct, not by your will.
Now I need to meditate. Yes, you heard correctly, NOW!
I'm sorry, I've already taken deep roots in this position.
I will not take anything that is not the fruit of Mother Nature.
I will not be corrupted by toxic ointments and artificial substances.
My body and my spirits naturally provides everything I need.
I accept pain as something natural. My intention is to embrace it, not eliminate it.
Will it help?... I doubt it.
Put that away from me, my destiny is marked by the spirits. Your gadgets and ointments won't change anything.
IT'S CORRUPT!!
It stinks of human corruption. Old and disgusting.
I won't change the natural course of life with foreign witchcraft.
What makes you think I need your help?
It is the wounds of the earth that need to be closed, not mine!
Let me bleed a little more. I will not deprive bats, mosquitoes and leeches of such a spectacle.
It is not the moment yet. Wait until I'm hurt and battered.
Now I want to feel the pain, which feeds my spirit and gives strength to the beasts within me.
Please, let me embrace extinction.
The spirits are the ones who are bleeding. My body... the least of all.
I can lick my own wounds, thanks.
I will attack you if you keep approaching me, I'm warning you!
Grrrrrr...
There's no greater force than the skies and the lands. So take that away from me!
I doubt that it gives me more strength than I already have in a natural way.
No, I will face them without anyone's help. Like a lone wolf.
No, I will defeat them without tricks or spells. In a natural, fair way.
Do you really think I'm afraid of being hurt?
NO! If I have to die, I will die as I came to life. Alone.
Don't try to stop the inevitable cycle of life...
Please, no. Use your skills for more fruitful ends.
No.
Grrrr...
If it comes from you, it won't be good...
This earth expels you! You're not worthy!
Contemplate the vengeful fury of nature!
I will make you pay for all the damage caused to this land!
We will all bathe in blood.
Your life cycle ends here!
Each broken twig will be paid with a broken bone.
Pour out the life you don't deserve!
I will heal this land of your filthy trace!
Enjoy the pain, it will be the last vestige of life that you will feel.
THIS IS UNNATURAL!
I feel this dark energy drying up all traces of life!
I will make you pay for all the damage that your ungodly magic caused to life!
You are strong and wise like an ancient oak. Don't let it bring you down
I know that your heart is full of courage and justice. The spirits see it.
Rub these herbs against the wound, it will relieve the pain.
The plants of this place have healing qualities that only I know...
I know the secret language of plants, birds and the wind. They will help us survive.
I was a civilized man, I lived in a big city until the spirits spoke to me and I saw the truth. You should listen too...
Have you ever heard the wolf cry to the blue corn moon?
If I die, I hope at least I have left some trace in all of you...
Not now... there is no time, they come after us...
I don't have the strength for it...
There's no life in this place to which I can ask for help.
I can't find a reason for it...
And who assures me that they will use my knowledge for something good?
They do not deserve my, nor my brothers' compassion.
I will not intercede in the natural course of things. If we are to suffer, so be it.
And deprive them of their pain?... No, let them suffer. They often forget how it is.
Leave me alone with my suffering...
You don't deserve the attention or the care of the land that you crush.
Some are born weak. I won't spend my time trying to uselessly strengthen you.
You exploit the land, you exploit the waters ... now you want to exploit me? Never!
The power of nature is reserved for those who worship it.
I have to meditate first. I need time for myself ...
My strength has left me, the spirits have quieted down. I'm sorry, I can't help you now.
The spirits don't want to hear my words...
Shut up! or you will scare the prey!
It's best if I stop watching over you. You are not pups anymore.
My presence will be enough help.
I will not eat food that I have not hunted.
Just by touching it, you contaminated it.
No, meditation and fasting takes you through deeper and more sincere paths.
I prefer to remain empty.
My hunger is spiritual, not physical.
The pain of the soul isn't healed with bread.
I prefer something... with... life.
Wait. I'm regurgitating for my chicks.
The Fable
The Fable
The Downfall of Ar
Theology and Civilization

Master of Puppies
Carnivale
Leader of the Pack

Let the heat of blood temper our spirits.
I can smell their fear...
Only silence will witness the death of my enemies.

I know their scent, I can hear them whisper to each other with no voice
The land will give us everything we need.
Take this. You need to nourish yourself.
These herbs and roots will alleviate our ailments.
We have the favor of the spirits that prowl this place.
I summon the animals that fell due to the corruption of this place.
Brave brothers, come to me and gramt us your strength from the other side.

I can hear the spirits lament inside me.
I am sacred. You are sacred. The land is sacred.
Spirits, Brothers ... have you abandoned me?
The roots of this site reek of death. The smell is unbearable!
Why should I team up with other humans? Are not we the cause of so much pain?
It disgusts me to belong to the most corrupt species that has trod this land!
This body is truly a cage for everything it contains.
Everything is sick. Everything is rotten, lonely, isolated and forgotten.
I should leave my body as feed for the beasts.
I should die so my remains feed the plants and the land.
I wish to be devoured so my essence will become part of another, nobler creature.
I deserve to be d forgotten forever. I will disappear in the memory of a vast universe.
I should nail my jaws in your throat and end your miserable and corrupt existence.

You deserve to be at the bottom of the food pyramid...
Even worms and parasites are embarrassed to see you fight.
I'm not at the same level as you. Your souls are still corrupt because of your nature...
In my eyes, you are nothing but scared prey.
You don't know, like me, the nature of human corruption or the darkness in your soul.
You will end up being food for a creature better than you.
I am the Alpha of this herd!
The earth dies, the animals are extinguished... and all because of humans.
None of this would have happened if the Ancestor hadn't been arrogant; like any human with power.
I feel very lonely fighting for something so fair...
Over half of the world's wildlife has been lost, and what we have left continues to decline....
In barely forty years we have extinguished almost half of the species in our planet.Regrettable...
Scraw! Scraw!
ROAR!!!
Quack! Quack!
Woof! Woof!
My determination will not be broken by the miserable ones. My conviction is iron and my ferocity is ardent.
I am the hunter who comes for you. Tremble before my roar.
I will feed on the horror that you have sown.
I will bring justice for those whose voice you have extinguished.
The fury of nature is on my side, trembling at her mortal embrace!
The spirits have spoken and they revealed to me how to crush any stone in our path.
I will make my enemies food for the grass and home for insects.
I will tear your throat with the force of my bare teeth!
I will feast on your your entrails. I am twinned with hyenas and vultures.
Every pore of my skin is full of light and hope!
My tattoos shine with the strength of a thousand species!
Follow in my footsteps, the way I advance will lead you to redemption and glory!
The regenerative power of lizard, worm and mollusk!
My soul pulses with thousands of lives!
I have strength and courage for anyone who needs it.
ROOOOAAAAAAR!!!!
Spirits watch over you too, mate.
I invoke the fallen ones to protect you and share their strength!
The spirit of the wolf is inside all of you. Can you feel it?!
Don't doubt, we are the hunters... they are prey.
I am a leader, a fighter, and the hope of this land. I will not give up!
It's time to lick my wounds.
Not even the earth will want to conquer our remains!
We are doomed to death. It is an unstoppable cycle.
The spirits shrink inside me, their laments and roars sound far away...
You can't escape your pathetic human nature.
Am I animals trapped in a body? Or a body trapped in animals?
I have failed you brothers, all of you. Because of me you will be forgotten ...
As man does with forests, I deserve to be ripped out and suffocated.
Belonging to the human species is my greatest condemnation. We deserve extinction.
Look at it in a positive way... Nature will get rid of four undesirable humans.
You! Parasite with two legs. Even snakes make you shade.
Don't worry. I will take care of feeding jackals with your corpse.
All of you are a ridiculous pack.
I will devour you one by one if it allows my survival.
You don't even know how to develop in the artificial and poisonous world that you have built.
The spirits will only help me, you don't deserve their claim.
More than 150 species are extinguished every day. Think about it...
The hopes of this team are doomed to extinction...
Are we the hunter or the hunted?
I need to get out of here! I must feed my litter!
And my chicks flew away, leaving the nest empty and filling it with sorrow.
It's convenient to wait. It's not time to pounce the prey.
Crouching in the brush is the best option.
I prefer not to be so exposed...
Better to stalk my prey instead of attacking it.
Better plan from the rear.
I have to act like rats or weasels.
My longing for the pulsing blood is irrepressible.
My body will be the shield for all life.
I expose myself without fear to claw and steel.
ROAAAAR!!!
I must hunt to survive!
SCREEEEEEW!!
SHHHHHHH!!
I will flee from this disaster by flapping my wings.
I'd better go back to the burrow
Destroy this cell of muscle and skin and release the spirits inside me!
I will accept my end courageously... without looking back.
My end has arrived. The cycle of life can't be escaped.
My powers are useless in the front line. And surely they are also in the rear...
I need to ponder my position in this whole situation.
I need to recover strength, and also hope...
Stand aside! I am the Alpha of the pack!
Get out of my way, human!
Your unnatural artifices are only a hindrance in my mission.
I don't intend to give my life for a handful of corrupt humans.
It would be better if you hunt for me.
Go ahead pack, defend your Alpha!
Death, death everywhere... the perpetual autumn
*plaintive howl*
The spirits howl terrified inside me.
I can't distract myself, the beast go after me claming revenge...
The spirits have stopped talking to me! I can't hear their voices!
The roots of time imprison my wrists with reproaches and grief. Mother, I failed you.
I know it's not a good time to meditate, but...
I will do what I think convenient. That's why I'm the leader of this pack.
Leave me a moment the Spirits have something to tell me and I need to hear them...
Everything is useless. I can do nothing to stop corruption.
I don't think that anything I can do will be able to improve the situation
My tattoos don't work. They need encouragement to shine again.
meowww...
I will act as the great oaks do. Watch time go by.
Not now, I'm hibernating.
The spirits guide my steps...
The spirits have taken control of this body!
Let me do it...
I will fall on them with the force of a condor!
I don't fear pain or death!
I will not be intimidated by pain. Pain reminds us that we are full of life!
Instinct is not tied to any order or any cheap convention!
I will not obey the orders of a parasitic mammal!
The indomitable soul is not bound in any order
I will know what to do...
Do you really think I intend to obey?
I trust my instinct more than your will...
Whatever I do, the result will be sterile...
Maybe by doing this I will calm the sorrow of the spirits.
My will is tied to a greater good. I'm just a puppet of the rough heart of the land.
I can`t repress the will of the land!
Act first. Think later.
There's no easy way out from this...
The vermin lurk in the shadows. 'Tis land seeks revenge for my many mistakes.
Predators prefer to hunt their prey at night, catching them off guard.
Enjoy the rest, we may not have many more opportunities to enjoy it.
While you rest our enemies are strengthened and corruption flourishes.
I begin to suspect that you do not share my goals, nor my path
This mission is a giant mousetrap. A hole we may never escape.
You do not know what real pain is, but I can show you...
The suffering of this land falls on my back. It is a weight I must bear.
If you knew what i do, you would stop trusting humans too.
Go ahead, sleep. Hopefully you will not wake up...
Try and turn your back on me and you will die!
Your flesh seems tender and tasty. For your sake, make sure we do not run out of food.
Go ahead, dream of a better world. A world in which man and his mark do not exist...
Stop prattling or I'll give your tongue to the birds.
Birds have better conversation than any of you...
Man will be responsible for his own extinction.
The Earth will respond to human egoism with a cataclysm.
Life is suffocating in this place. We move in a dark and dull direction.
The spirits will contemplate our end with silent eyes.
My instinct asks for blood and violence. And I will give in...
I delighted with his flesh to gain his strength and power. Only the pink bones remained...
They cornered me and hunted me down. Skinning me when even my breath had not given way.
Our constantly increasing demands on nature are driving wildlife to extinction...
Face me if you have the courage to do so. Grrr...
Here you have my bare chest. Dare to pierce my flesh!
I accept my end with stoicity. Go ahead, strike down this body and free the lives it contains.
Mother earth, I come to your naked breast, to the origin of everything.
Come on... COME ON!!
It's me you're looking for. I represent everything you crave to destroy!!
You are the main problem on this team. As a stone on the road!
Only the strongest survive here. It is the natural law!
Selfish and corrupting human! All of you are to blame for so much suffering!
You are much more useful as a home for plants and insects!
YOU ARE MY PREY!!
The spirits have marked you as their enemy!
Pain reminds us that we are full of life!
I spill my blood for the injustices against mother nature!
No one can defeat me except my condemned heart.
I feel the responsibility of the guilt of my kind on my shoulders!
Spirits bite and scratch my body from the inside, fighting to escape of this cage of flesh!
I will taste my own flesh, I will eat myself and I will be born again from my hunger!
I promise to kill you one by one if you act so cowardly!
Accept your end with honor and strength. Show your chest and raise your forehead!
I think none of us will come out of this...

I'm not going to perish alone...
If the spirits tell us to stay still, we will do it!
Grrrrrr...

I'll end up with more scars than ink on my skin!

It's just a scratch... disappointing.
You have damaged my plumage!
GRRRAWWRR!!

I am not worth the responsibility I charge.
I don't find reasons to this disaster!
The enemy knows our steps... someone has been stalking us!
My rage blinds my blows!
I should hurt myself. Surely that way doesn't miss...
I am like a lion without teeth...
SSShhhh...
Your artifices have distanced you from your true nature.
I would not have missed such a laughable prey ...
As fierce as a sloth...
You have lost your natural instinct...
The battlefield awakens my appetite...
Let me wallow among their corpses!
If we continue like this we will end up with our bones in their jaws!
We have no chance against them!
We are old for this...
Your mistakes are our condemnation!
Some are born to be cattle.
You are the best at wasting opportunities!
Your enemies are faster than you... and wiser.
It would be better if you hide your head under the ground.
I can smell your mediocrity from here.
The best thing will be to return to our burrow!
I fear that our team will be reduced shortly...
Can you smell that bitter essence? It is Death.
Why do I team with you?!
You could have dodged it. The reasons why you have not done it ... are not within my reach.
That is what we need: Violence, blood, pain... that which fuels instinct.
The beasts within me are agitated by your pain!
You will finish with your head on the top of their banners.
As agile and veiled as a ancient tortoise...
The spirits seek your pain. Their plans come as whispers to my ears!
Test your own blood and you will feel the taste of fear!
We'll see if the rest are so lucky.
Sooner or later you will die. It's the natural cycle. You've just won a little time.
It's as if you were coordinated...
A suspicious reaction...
An unequal fight, and as such... cowardly.
Now it's my turn to receive a blow, to maintain the balance of the universe.
From this site I can stalk them better... and I'm more secure.
I will remain in this position. If I want to survive I must first trust my judgment.
I don't need a more defensive position!
No, I still don't have enough scars on my body!
I won't obey the barking of a puppy...
I move by instinct, not by your will.
Now I need to meditate. Yes, you heard correctly, NOW!
I'm sorry, I've already taken deep roots in this position.
I will not take anything that is not the fruit of Mother Nature.
I will not be corrupted by toxic ointments and artificial substances.
My body and my spirits naturally provides everything I need.
I accept pain as something natural. My intention is to embrace it, not eliminate it.
Will it help?... I doubt it.
Put that away from me, my destiny is marked by the spirits. Your gadgets and ointments won't change anything.
IT'S CORRUPT !!
It stinks of human corruption. As old as disgusting.
I won't change the natural course of life with foreign witchcraft.
What makes you think I need your help?
It is the wounds of the earth that need to be closed, not mine!
Let me bleed a little more. I will not deprive bats, mosquitoes and leeches of such a spectacle.
It is not the moment yet. Wait until I'm hurt and battered.
Now I want to feel the pain, which feeds my spirit and gives strength to the beasts within me.
Please, let me embrace extinction.
The spirits are the ones who are bleeding. My body... it's the least of all.
I can lick my own wounds, thanks.
I will attack you if you keep approaching me, I warn you!
Grrrrrr...
There's no greater force than that of the skies and the lands. Take that away from me!
I doubt that it gives me more strength than I already have in a natural way.
No, I will face them without anyone's help. Like a lone wolf.
No, I will defeat them without tricks or spells. In a natural, fair way.
Do you really think I'm afraid of being hurt?
NO! If I have to die, I will die as I came to the life. Alone.
Don't try to stop the inevitable cycle of life...
Please, no. Use your skills for more fruitful ends.
No.
Grrrr...
If it comes from you it doesn't have to be good...
This earth expels you, you arn't worthy to step on it!
Contemplate the vengeful fury of nature!
I will make you pay for all the damage caused to this land!
We will all bathe in blood.
Your life cycle ends here!
Each broken twig will be paid with a broken bone.
Pour out the life you don't deserve!.
I will heal this land of your filthy trace!
Enjoy the pain, it will be the last vestige of life that you will feel in your body.
THIS IS UNNATURAL!
I feel this dark energy drying up all traces of life!
I will make you pay for all the damage that your ungodly magic caused to life!
You are strong and wise like an ancient oak. Don't let it bring you down

Rub these herbs against the wound, it will relieve the pain.
The plants of this place have healing qualities that only I know...
I know the secret language of plants, birds and the wind. They will help us survive.
I was a civilized man, I lived in a big city until the spirits spoke to me and I saw the truth. You should listen too...
Have you ever heard the wolf cry to the blue corn moon?
If I die, I hope at least I have left some trace in all of you...
Now no ... there is no time, they come after us ...
I don't have the strength for it...
There's no life in this place to which I can ask for help.
I don't find a reason for it...
And who assures me that they will use my knowledge for something good?
They do not deserve it. They do not deserve my compassion. Nor of my brothers.
I will not intercede in the natural course of things. If we are to suffer, so be it.
And deprive them of their pain?... No, let them suffer. They often forget how it is.
Leave me alone with my suffering...
You don't deserve the attention or the care of the land that you crush.
Some are born weak. I won't spend my time trying to uselessly strengthen you.
You exploit the land, You exploit the waters ... now you want to exploit me? Never!
The power of nature is reserved for those who worship it.
I have to meditate first. I need time for myself ...
My strength has left me, the spirits have quieted down. I'm sorry, I can't help you now.
The spirits don't want to hear my words...
Shut up! or you will scare the prey!
The best thing is that I stop watching over you. You are not pups anymore.
My presence will be enough help.
I will not eat food that I have not hunted.
Just by touching it, you surely contaminated it.
No, meditation in fasting takes you through deeper and more sincere paths.
I prefer to remain empty.
My hunger is spiritual, not physical.
The pain of the soul isn't healed with bread.
I prefer something... with... life.
Wait. I'm regurgitating for my chicks.

This man embodies the duality of nature, serving as both wise shaman and deadly predator. Swift and cunning, the Beastmaster can hunt down his prey in wild close combat, inflicting bleeding wounds in his righteous rage. When the time is right, he can {colour_start|notable}Prowl{colour_end} away from the heat of frontline combat and prepare: either for a deadly ambush or to call upon the spirits in aid of his pack. In nature, nothing is wasted: fallen corpses can be consumed to gain great power, or be seeded to create a temporary ally.

As a master of wildlife, the Beastmaster uses his surroundings to ensure the group's survival. He adapts to the fallow regions surrounding the hamlet by utilizing endemic herbs and consulting local spirits. During long nights, he wanders off to commune with animals and track down potential threats, making him a perfect scout to ensure safe exploration through these corrupted lands.

The Beastmaster eschews heavy armor, needing little more than life-affirming flesh and twin blades to defy corruption. Druidic knowledge and shamanic abilities provide finer protection than any steel. The ritual tattoos painted across his body are carved in exaltation of nature spirits, marking him as the embodiment of vengeance for all wildlife tainted by malicious evil.

This man embodies the duality of nature, serving as both wise shaman and deadly predator. Swift and cunning, the Beastmaster can hunt down his prey in wild close combat, inflicting bleeding wounds in his righteous rage. When the time is right, he can {colour_start|notable}Prowl{colour_end} away from the heat of frontline combat and prepare: either for a deadly ambush or to call upon the spirits in aid of his pack. In nature, nothing is wasted: fallen corpses can be consumed to gain great power, or be seeded to create a temporary ally.

As a master of wildlife, the Beastmaster uses his surroundings to ensure the group's survival. He adapts to the fallow regions surrounding the hamlet by utilizing endemic herbs and consulting local spirits. During long nights, he wanders off to commune with animals and track down potential threats, making him a perfect scout to ensure safe exploration through these corrupted lands.

The Beastmaster eschews heavy armor, needing little more than life-affirming flesh and twin blades to defy corruption. Druidic knowledge and shamanic abilities provide finer protection than any steel. The ritual tattoos painted across his body are carved in exaltation of nature spirits, marking him as the embodiment of vengeance for all wildlife tainted by malicious evil.

This man embodies the duality of nature, serving as both wise shaman and deadly predator. Swift and cunning, the Beastmaster can hunt down his prey in wild close combat, inflicting bleeding wounds in his righteous rage. When the time is right, he can {colour_start|notable}Prowl{colour_end} away from the heat of frontline combat and prepare: either for a deadly ambush or to call upon the spirits in aid of his pack. In nature, nothing is wasted: fallen corpses can be consumed to gain great power, or be seeded to create a temporary ally.

As a master of wildlife, the Beastmaster uses his surroundings to ensure the group's survival. He adapts to the fallow regions surrounding the hamlet by utilizing endemic herbs and consulting local spirits. During long nights, he wanders off to commune with animals and track down potential threats, making him a perfect scout to ensure safe exploration through these corrupted lands.

The Beastmaster eschews heavy armor, needing little more than life-affirming flesh and twin blades to defy corruption. Druidic knowledge and shamanic abilities provide finer protection than any steel. The ritual tattoos painted across his body are carved in exaltation of nature spirits, marking him as the embodiment of vengeance for all wildlife tainted by malicious evil.

This man embodies the duality of nature, serving as both wise shaman and deadly predator. Swift and cunning, the Beastmaster can hunt down his prey in wild close combat, inflicting bleeding wounds in his righteous rage. When the time is right, he can {colour_start|notable}Prowl{colour_end} away from the heat of frontline combat and prepare: either for a deadly ambush or to call upon the spirits in aid of his pack. In nature, nothing is wasted: fallen corpses can be consumed to gain great power, or be seeded to create a temporary ally.

As a master of wildlife, the Beastmaster uses his surroundings to ensure the group's survival. He adapts to the fallow regions surrounding the hamlet by utilizing endemic herbs and consulting local spirits. During long nights, he wanders off to commune with animals and track down potential threats, making him a perfect scout to ensure safe exploration through these corrupted lands.

The Beastmaster eschews heavy armor, needing little more than life-affirming flesh and twin blades to defy corruption. Druidic knowledge and shamanic abilities provide finer protection than any steel. The ritual tattoos painted across his body are carved in exaltation of nature spirits, marking him as the embodiment of vengeance for all wildlife tainted by malicious evil.

I don't find a reason for it...

They do not deserve it. They do not deserve my compassion. Nor of my brothers.
I will not intercede in the natural course of things. If we are to suffer, so be it.
And deprive them of their pain?... No, let them suffer. They often forget how it is.
Leave me alone with my suffering...
You don't deserve the attention or the care of the land that you crush.
Some are born weak. I won't spend my time trying to uselessly strengthen you.
You exploit the land, You exploit the waters ... now you want to exploit me? Never!
The power of nature is reserved for those who worship it.
I have to meditate first. I need time for myself ...
My strength has left me, the spirits have quieted down. I'm sorry, I can't help you now.
The spirits don't want to hear my words...
Shut up! or you will scare the prey!
The best thing is that I stop watching over you. You are not pups anymore.
My presence will be enough help.
I will not eat food that I have not hunted.
Just by touching it, you surely contaminated it.
No, meditation in fasting takes you through deeper and more sincere paths.
I prefer to remain empty.
My hunger is spiritual, not physical.
The pain of the soul isn't healed with bread.
I prefer something... with... life.
Wait. I'm regurgitating for my chicks.

This man embodies the duality of nature, serving as both wise shaman and deadly predator. Swift and cunning, the Beastmaster can hunt down his prey in wild close combat, inflicting bleeding wounds in his righteous rage. When the time is right, he can {colour_start|notable}Prowl{colour_end} away from the heat of frontline combat and prepare: either for a deadly ambush or to call upon the spirits in aid of his pack. In nature, nothing is wasted: fallen corpses can be consumed to gain great power, or be seeded to create a temporary ally.

As a master of wildlife, the Beastmaster uses his surroundings to ensure the group's survival. He adapts to the fallow regions surrounding the hamlet by utilizing endemic herbs and consulting local spirits. During long nights, he wanders off to commune with animals and track down potential threats, making him a perfect scout to ensure safe exploration through these corrupted lands.

The Beastmaster eschews heavy armor, needing little more than life-affirming flesh and twin blades to defy corruption. Druidic knowledge and shamanic abilities provide finer protection than any steel. The ritual tattoos painted across his body are carved in exaltation of nature spirits, marking him as the embodiment of vengeance for all wildlife tainted by malicious evil.

From death springs life!
Spirits of the Ancients protect me!
A deserved rest after fighting against the corruption of this site.
I will meditate in silence while you rest your agitated bodies.
I need to rest to regain strength and cleanse my spirit.
There you have it, the unclean heart. Origin of all evil and corruption.
I don't intend to put myself in the hands of those quacks.
The poisons of these people don't overshadow the natural medicine.
I don't plan to go there...
They treat me like a savage when savagery comes from their practices.
I abandoned civilization long ago.
Are you aware of the animals they torture to reach their ointments?
I don't want to be part of this voracious and corrupt human society.
Maybe I fall here. But my message has taken root. Many others will come after me.
I will fight against all this malice until my last breath!!
I return to the bosom of Mother Nature. It is the endless cycle of all things.
Death is only part of a cycle
I will return to the earth i came from
Wicked being ! part but depart from nature.
This thing exist beyond all cycles
These preators are no children of the wilds
The hunter becomes the hunted
We are just prey sent out to be hunted
The corruption has taken hold of this place
I lost the tracks.... Hope of return is futile
Can you see the beasts eyes glaring at us from the dark
We are stalked watch your backs
Theye predaors ar beyond my experience
I can see the beast within you. Do not try to hide it
I can feel the pain of a thousand souls
The agony of all these souls is to much to bear
A broken bone for each broken twig !
Peel of my skin!!!
My skin burns in tn pain of thousnad deaths
Your hamlet is a memorial to folly
You detached yourself from nture, but she will claim you back
The endless cycle of pain will never end. You start it any second anew
No deed can redemm what we id to nature we should all perish

I better survive on my own
Your civilizatioon made you weak. Survive alone
Nature rejects unpure souls like you.
The wild will claim the weak.
Proff yourself to nature. Kill or be killed
This place is a wound wich can never be healed
Corruption soaked any root and any plant. This place is lost
The wilds silent. No bird shares its song anymore
I can feel the pain of this wicked being. We need to end it
*Gnarls*
Your prowess is better left to me. Let me usurp you i will take care of your suffering
The soils screams in agony, we can never calm these tainted grounds
The birds do not peck in this place, and their nests are full of bones...
I can hear the spirits lament inside me.
I am sacred. You are sacred. The land is sacred.
Spirits, Brothers ... have you abandoned me?
The roots of this site reek of death. The smell is unbearable!
Why should I team up with other humans? Are not we the cause of so much pain?
It disgusts me to belong to the most corrupt species that has trod this land!
This body is truly a cage for everything it contains.
Everything is sick. Everything is rotten, lonely, isolated and forgotten.
I should leave my body as feed for the beasts.
I should die so my remains feed the plants and the land.
I wish to be devoured so my essence will become part of another, nobler creature.
I deserve to be d forgotten forever. I will disappear in the memory of a vast universe.
I should nail my jaws in your throat and end your miserable and corrupt existence.
Humans so selfish, so full of arrogance. Miserable believing everything is theirs...
What is the point of fighting in the common good if you kill animals and corrupt the river water?
You deserve to be at the bottom of the food pyramid...
Even worms and parasites are embarrassed to see you fight.
I'm not at the same level as you. Your souls are still corrupt because of your nature...
In my eyes, you are nothing but scared prey.
You don't know, like me, the nature of human corruption or the darkness in your soul.
You will end up being food for a creature better than you.
I am the Alpha of this herd!
The earth dies, the animals are extinguished... and all because of humans.
None of this would have happened if the Ancestor hadn't been arrogant; like any human with power.
I feel very lonely fighting for something so fair...
Over half of the world's wildlife has been lost, and what we have left continues to decline....
In barely forty years we have extinguished almost half of the species in our planet.Regrettable...
Scraw! Scraw!
ROAR!!!
Quack! Quack!
Woof! Woof!
My determination will not be broken by the miserable ones. My conviction is iron and my ferocity is ardent.
I am the hunter who comes for you. Tremble before my roar.
I will feed on the horror that you have sown.
I will bring justice for those whose voice you have extinguished.
The fury of nature is on my side, trembling at her mortal embrace!
The spirits have spoken and they revealed to me how to crush any stone in our path.
I will make my enemies food for the grass and home for insects.
I will tear your throat with the force of my bare teeth!
I will feast on your your entrails. I am twinned with hyenas and vultures.
Every pore of my skin is full of light and hope!
My tattoos shine with the strength of a thousand species!
Follow in my footsteps, the way I advance will lead you to redemption and glory!
The regenerative power of lizard, worm and mollusk!
My soul pulses with thousands of lives!
I have strength and courage for anyone who needs it.
ROOOOAAAAAAR!!!!
Spirits watch over you too, mate.
I invoke the fallen ones to protect you and share their strength!
The spirit of the wolf is inside all of you. Can you feel it?!
Don't doubt, we are the hunters... they are prey.

It's time to lick my wounds.
Not even the earth will want to conquer our remains!
We are doomed to death. It is an unstoppable cycle.
The spirits shrink inside me, their laments and roars sound far away...
You can't escape your pathetic human nature.

The hopes of this team are doomed to extinction...
Are we the hunter or the hunted?
I need to get out of here! I must feed my litter!
And my chicks flew away, leaving the nest empty and filling it with sorrow.
It's convenient to wait. It's not time to pounce the prey.
Crouching in the brush is the best option.
I prefer not to be so exposed...
Better to stalk my prey instead of attacking it.
Better plan from the rear.
I have to act like rats or weasels.
My longing for the pulsing blood is irrepressible.
My body will be the shield for all life.
I expose myself without fear to claw and steel.
ROAAAAR!!!
I must hunt to survive!
SCREEEEEEW!!
SHHHHHHH!!
I will flee from this disaster by flapping my wings.
I'd better go back to the burrow
Destroy this cell of muscle and skin and release the spirits inside me!
I will accept my end courageously... without looking back.
My end has arrived. The cycle of life can't be escaped.
My powers are useless in the front line. And surely they are also in the rear...
I need to ponder my position in this whole situation.
I need to recover strength, and also hope...
Stand aside! I am the Alpha of the pack!
Get out of my way, human!
Your unnatural artifices are only a hindrance in my mission.
I don't intend to give my life for a handful of corrupt humans.
It would be better if you hunt for me.
Go ahead pack, defend your Alpha!
Death, death everywhere... the perpetual autumn
*plaintive howl*
The spirits howl terrified inside me.
I can't distract myself, the beast go after me claming revenge...
The spirits have stopped talking to me! I can't hear their voices!
The roots of time imprison my wrists with reproaches and grief. Mother, I failed you.
I know it's not a good time to meditate, but...
I will do what I think convenient. That's why I'm the leader of this pack.
Leave me a moment the Spirits have something to tell me and I need to hear them...
Everything is useless. I can do nothing to stop corruption.
I don't think that anything I can do will be able to improve the situation
My tattoos don't work. They need encouragement to shine again.
meowww...
I will act as the great oaks do. Watch time go by.
Not now, I'm hibernating.
The spirits guide my steps...
The spirits have taken control of this body!
Let me do it...
I will fall on them with the force of a condor!
I don't fear pain or death!
I will not be intimidated by pain. Pain reminds us that we are full of life!
Instinct is not tied to any order or any cheap convention!
I will not obey the orders of a parasitic mammal!
The indomitable soul is not bound in any order
I will know what to do...
Do you really think I intend to obey?
I trust my instinct more than your will...
Whatever I do, the result will be sterile...
Maybe by doing this I will calm the sorrow of the spirits.
My will is tied to a greater good. I'm just a puppet of the rough heart of the land.
I can`t repress the will of the land!
Act first. Think later.
There's no easy way out from this...
The vermin lurk in the shadows. 'Tis land seeks revenge for my many mistakes.
Predators prefer to hunt their prey at night, catching them off guard.
Enjoy the rest, we may not have many more opportunities to enjoy it.
While you rest our enemies are strengthened and corruption flourishes.
I begin to suspect that you do not share my goals, nor my path
This mission is a giant mousetrap. A hole we may never escape.
You do not know what real pain is, but I can show you...
The suffering of this land falls on my back. It is a weight I must bear.
If you knew what i do, you would stop trusting humans too.
Go ahead, sleep. Hopefully you will not wake up...
Try and turn your back on me and you will die!
Your flesh seems tender and tasty. For your sake, make sure we do not run out of food.
Go ahead, dream of a better world. A world in which man and his mark do not exist...
Stop prattling or I'll give your tongue to the birds.
Birds have better conversation than any of you...
Man will be responsible for his own extinction.
The Earth will respond to human egoism with a cataclysm.
Life is suffocating in this place. We move in a dark and dull direction.
The spirits will contemplate our end with silent eyes.
My instinct asks for blood and violence. And I will give in...
I delighted with his flesh to gain his strength and power. Only the pink bones remained...
They cornered me and hunted me down. Skinning me when even my breath had not given way.
Our constantly increasing demands on nature are driving wildlife to extinction...
Face me if you have the courage to do so. Grrr...
Here you have my bare chest. Dare to pierce my flesh!
I accept my end with stoicity. Go ahead, strike down this body and free the lives it contains.
Mother earth, I come to your naked breast, to the origin of everything.
Come on... COME ON!!
It's me you're looking for. I represent everything you crave to destroy!!
You are the main problem on this team. As a stone on the road!
Only the strongest survive here. It is the natural law!
Selfish and corrupting human! All of you are to blame for so much suffering!
You are much more useful as a home for plants and insects!
YOU ARE MY PREY!!
The spirits have marked you as their enemy!
Pain reminds us that we are full of life!
I spill my blood for the injustices against mother nature!
No one can defeat me except my condemned heart.
I feel the responsibility of the guilt of my kind on my shoulders!
Spirits bite and scratch my body from the inside, fighting to escape of this cage of flesh!
I will taste my own flesh, I will eat myself and I will be born again from my hunger!
I promise to kill you one by one if you act so cowardly!
Accept your end with honor and strength. Show your chest and raise your forehead!
I think none of us will come out of this...
Sorry brothers, our hopes have been consumed...
I'm not going to perish alone...
If the spirits tell us to stay still, we will do it!
Grrrrrr...
If my nest has burned, we will burn too!
They pounce on us like hyenas!
I'll end up with more scars than ink on my skin!
My mission can't end here! Not like this!
Pain grows from the seed of our incompetence!
I have to endure the attacks that only others deserve!
Go ahead, leave me alone! I do not need your help in this combat!
Is that all? Come on... my body can stand much more!
It's just a scratch... disappointing.
You have damaged my plumage!
GRRRAWWRR!!
My... my powers abandon me. The spirits have withdrawn their word!
I am not worth the responsibility I charge.
I don't find reasons to this disaster!
The enemy knows our steps... someone has been stalking us!
My rage blinds my blows!
I should hurt myself. Surely that way doesn't miss...
I am like a lion without teeth...
SSShhhh...
Your artifices have distanced you from your true nature.
I would not have missed such a laughable prey ...
As fierce as a sloth...
You have lost your natural instinct...
The battlefield awakens my appetite...
Let me wallow among their corpses!
If we continue like this we will end up with our bones in their jaws!
We have no chance against them!
We are old for this...
Your mistakes are our condemnation!
Some are born to be cattle.
You are the best at wasting opportunities!
Your enemies are faster than you... and wiser.
It would be better if you hide your head under the ground.
I can smell your mediocrity from here.
The best thing will be to return to our burrow!
I fear that our team will be reduced shortly...
Can you smell that bitter essence? It is Death.
Why do I team with you?!
You could have dodged it. The reasons why you have not done it ... are not within my reach.
That is what we need: Violence, blood, pain... that which fuels instinct.
The beasts within me are agitated by your pain!
You will finish with your head on the top of their banners.
As agile and veiled as a ancient tortoise...
The spirits seek your pain. Their plans come as whispers to my ears!
Test your own blood and you will feel the taste of fear!
We'll see if the rest are so lucky.
Sooner or later you will die. It's the natural cycle. You've just won a little time.
It's as if you were coordinated...
A suspicious reaction...
An unequal fight, and as such... cowardly.
Now it's my turn to receive a blow, to maintain the balance of the universe.
From this site I can stalk them better... and I'm more secure.
I will remain in this position. If I want to survive I must first trust my judgment.
I don't need a more defensive position!
No, I still don't have enough scars on my body!
I won't obey the barking of a puppy...
I move by instinct, not by your will.
Now I need to meditate. Yes, you heard correctly, NOW!
I'm sorry, I've already taken deep roots in this position.
I will not take anything that is not the fruit of Mother Nature.
I will not be corrupted by toxic ointments and artificial substances.
My body and my spirits naturally provides everything I need.
I accept pain as something natural. My intention is to embrace it, not eliminate it.
Will it help?... I doubt it.
Put that away from me, my destiny is marked by the spirits. Your gadgets and ointments won't change anything.
IT'S CORRUPT !!
It stinks of human corruption. As old as disgusting.
I won't change the natural course of life with foreign witchcraft.
What makes you think I need your help?
It is the wounds of the earth that need to be closed, not mine!
Let me bleed a little more. I will not deprive bats, mosquitoes and leeches of such a spectacle.
It is not the moment yet. Wait until I'm hurt and battered.

Please, let me embrace extinction.
The spirits are the ones who are bleeding. My body... it's the least of all.
I can lick my own wounds, thanks.
I will attack you if you keep approaching me, I warn you!
Grrrrrr...
There's no greater force than that of the skies and the lands. Take that away from me!
I doubt that it gives me more strength than I already have in a natural way.
No, I will face them without anyone's help. Like a lone wolf.
No, I will defeat them without tricks or spells. In a natural, fair way.
Do you really think I'm afraid of being hurt?
NO! If I have to die, I will die as I came to the life. Alone.
Don't try to stop the inevitable cycle of life...
Please, no. Use your skills for more fruitful ends.
No.
Grrrr...
If it comes from you it doesn't have to be good...
This earth expels you, you arn't worthy to step on it!
Contemplate the vengeful fury of nature!
I will make you pay for all the damage caused to this land!
We will all bathe in blood.
Your life cycle ends here!
Each broken twig will be paid with a broken bone.
Pour out the life you don't deserve!.
I will heal this land of your filthy trace!
Enjoy the pain, it will be the last vestige of life that you will feel in your body.
THIS IS UNNATURAL!
I feel this dark energy drying up all traces of life!
I will make you pay for all the damage that your ungodly magic caused to life!
You are strong and wise like an ancient oak. Don't let it bring you down
I know that your heart is full of courage and justice. The spirits see it.
Rub these herbs against the wound, it will relieve the pain.
The plants of this place have healing qualities that only I know...

Now no ... there is no time, they come after us ...
I don't have the strength for it...
There's no life in this place to which I can ask for help.
I don't find a reason for it...

They do not deserve it. They do not deserve my compassion. Nor of my brothers.

Leave me alone with my suffering...
You don't deserve the attention or the care of the land that you crush.

The power of nature is reserved for those who worship it.

Spirits of the Ancients protect me!
A deserved rest after fighting against the corruption of this site.
I will meditate in silence while you rest your agitated bodies.
I need to rest to regain strength and cleanse my spirit.
There you have it, the unclean heart. Origin of all evil and corruption.
I don't intend to put myself in the hands of those quacks.
The poisons of these people don't overshadow the natural medicine.
I don't plan to go there...
They treat me like a savage when savagery comes from their practices.
I abandoned civilization long ago.
Are you aware of the animals they torture to reach their ointments?
I don't want to be part of this voracious and corrupt human society.
Maybe I fall here. But my message has taken root. Many others will come after me.
I will fight against all this malice until my last breath!!
I return to the bosom of Mother Nature. It is the endless cycle of all things.
Death is only part of a cycle
I will return to the earth i came from
Wicked being ! part but depart from nature.
This thing exist beyond all cycles
These preators are no children of the wilds
The hunter becomes the hunted
We are just prey sent out to be hunted

I lost the tracks.... Hope of return is futile
Can you see the beasts eyes glaring at us from the dark
We are stalked watch your backs
Theye predaors ar beyond my experience

I can feel the pain of a thousand souls

My skin burns in tn pain of thousnad deaths
